author: daijy
msg: PIG-2791: Pig does not work with Namenode Federation

author: dkulp
msg: Add Apache Http Components NIO based client - works fairly well at this point, but having very sporatic errors with chunk headers being sent wrong.  (like less than 1% of the time).  No idea what's happening there.

author: dkulp
msg: Add experiment using Jetty client APIs - fairly simple, but the API's do require a fair bit of copying of bytes between buffers.  Additionally, if using their getRequestContentChunk api's, creates a bunch of extra network packets for the chunk sizes.
